view

Class AlbumListController

  • java.lang.Object
    • view.AlbumListController

  • public class AlbumListController
extends java.lang.Object
    This controller is responsible for showing the list of albums created under this user.
    Author:
    Anand Raju, Sammy Berger

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AlbumListController()

    • Constructor Detail

      • AlbumListController

        public AlbumListController()

    • Method Detail

      • initData

        public void initData(UsersApp ap,
                     User u)
        Method for passing data to the controller
        Parameters:
        ap - UsersApp object to grab the stock user
        u - User data needed to list the albums

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        Upon starting the controller, the user's albums are put into an observable list. The handler for closing the window is also set to save the user's data.

      • gotoDetail

        public void gotoDetail(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Eventhandler responsible for opening an Album and listing all its photos. Upon clicking the 'Open' button, the controller passes data to the detial view and switches to the AlbumDetailView.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • makeAlbum

        public void makeAlbum(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                      java.io.IOException
        Eventhandler responsible for creating an Album. Upon clicking the 'create' button, a text input dialogue is created asking the user for an album name. Once the user inputs a valid name, the new album is created, and each photo from the Stock user's album is added to the newly created album.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • delAlbum

        public void delAlbum()
        EventHandler for deleting the selected album from the list

      • renAlbum

        public void renAlbum()
        EventHandler for renaming a selected Album. Upon clicking the 'edit' button, a TextInput dialogue is created. Once the user enters a valid input, the album is renamed.

      • search

        public void search(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
            throws java.io.IOException
        Will try to search using the given keywords. Will error if the search format is not valid.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • updateList

        public void updateList()
        Helper method for simply updating the list after changes

      • logOut

        public void logOut(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Handles logging out to the LoginView when the logout button is pressed. First the event writes to the UsersApp and then sends a null app to the Login Controller such that the controller will read a fresh list of updated users upon starting
        Parameters:
        e - an Action event.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
